features: NOTE: This pillow is supportive and FIRM, NOT SOFT

Best Seat Cushion - If you spend +8 hours a day in a seated position, this comfortable pad is just right for you. It provides additional support you need to maintain good posture and the natural curve of the spine. By evenly distributing weight of the body, it offloading pressure on the spinal discs. The ergonomic design helps to increase blood flow, prevents pain in the lower back, helps with muscle fatigue, leg tightness, hamstring. It allows you to sit upright naturally without pain

High Quality Chair Pad - Measuring 17.7"x 13.8"x 2.8", the butt support pillow comes with a removable and breathable black mesh cover, that provides great air circulation and allows you to sit without feeling hot or sweaty. The non-slip rubber base of the pad securely keeps it in place. The cushion insert is made from Slow Rebound Memory Foam that conforms to your individual shape and helps to avoid pressure. The handle is attached to the side of the pillow, making it easy to take it with you

Works with Any Chair - This ergonomic seat cushion nicely fits most office chairs and school chairs. U-shaped contoured design rests your tailbone, avoiding compression. This pillow is also a good option to consider, if you move around a lot. Take it in your car, on a plane or a train. Great for office use, frequent travelers, sporting events. This cushion will help to reduce neck, shoulder, and low back pain. Perfect alternative to donut and hemorrhoid pillows. Best for Adults 150 - 220 lbs

Orthopedic Doctor Recommended - This thick pad repeats the anatomical contours of your body, supports your lumbar area, and lessens the pressure on your back. It avoids the occurrence and progression of spine problems and ensures health. Moreover, it can be used to increase the height of any seat. This therapeutic lift cushion provides additional comfort when driving long distances (truckers, drivers) and rest if sitting in slow-moving traffic. Note:The pillow is supportive and Firm, Not Soft

Firm & Supportive: The orthopedic seat cushion should be firm enough. Our office chair cushion is a perfect mix of firmness and comfort. However, please allow yourself 1-3 weeks to adapt to a new feeling while sitting. Stay healthy with 5 Stars United sciatica pillow for sitting

productInformation.name: Product Care Instructions
productInformation.value: Open the cushion bottom zipper. Take the pad out of the cover. Cover is machine washable on a gentle cycle with cold water. Line or Flat dry. DO NOT PUT MEMORY FOAM IN WASHER OR DRYER.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Yes, this works!...jus what i needed to help my back from sitting all day.
reviews.reviewText: Ok so i got this cushion becuz i sit all day, i try to kneel on the floor, sit in a kneeling chair and stand at my desk throughout the day so that i am not sitting all day. If i sit all day my sacrum is killing me by the time i get home. about 15yrs ago i had surgery for a herniation between my sacrum and L5. I've been fortunate becuz only since last yr my back has been causing me alot of problems, probably becuz of being locked down and staying home more due to covid. Fast forward....This cushions works, it is firm, it keeps it's shape, it is comfortable, it absolutely helps, i can sit on it all day and my back doesn't hurt.When i first sat in the cushion the first day it made my lower back hurt, however i very quickly realized that IF that happens to add sum lumbar support. I hav a lumbar pillow so once i put that in place i was VERY comfy. I now see why two pillows are shown when u order. i think the lumbar support is key here, when using the cushion.I do understand that the cushion was NOT causing harm to my back, becuz i was sitting differently other back muslces needed to be engaged more. Im happy that using that extra lumbar support worked becuz it really does feel so much better. Feels like normal, when you were young and didn't hav any back problems.i am very happy with this purchase, it is exactly what i needed and the best part is my back doesn't bother me from sitting all day.P.S.1. Play with the adjusting of the cushion, just sit it in at first,2. then get up and push it all the way back in the chair, then sit down in it, see how u like that.3. Then get up and move it forward in the chair and see how you like that. (note if the cushion is more forward in the chair the lumbar support is most useful for that perfect form of sitting up straight and tall in the chair.4. most importantly is to play around with the positioning so you find the most comfortable position for you.I was so happy with this purchase i had to write a review!Thanks for reading and have an awesome day!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works when properly paired with the right chair
reviews.reviewText: I got this a few years ago and tried to use it with an office chair that had no more cushion left in the seat. Unfortunately, the seat was much larger than this cushion, so it never felt right. Very uncomfortable. So I put it aside as "one of those" purchases.Years later, that old POS office chair is long gone. New chair is smaller, and this cushion fits perfectly! I've not been using it for about 4 months straight, every day, and it's really made a difference, especially on my tail bone and sciatica. The memory foam used is very firm, as it should be. Very happy now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfy but had a weird smell
reviews.reviewText: This is so comfortable and makes my cheap, crappy chair great. But it has a strange chemical smell and that is very strong. I’ve been using it for a couple of weeks, but the smell won’t go away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great balance of support and comfort
reviews.reviewText: bruised my tail bone, couldn't hardly sit in office chair (very uncomfortable/stiff). Bought this, had delivered same day, and found it really helped and allowed me to sit (still stiff when get up). I like the support of this pillow, firm yet soft. Feels good to the legs, supports good posture - probably will keep using it for awhile.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It does the job fine but it smells like paint in a bad way. Bad enough that when you move on it you get a strong odor, and after I sat in it for 6 hours yesterday and went home, I could smell it on my clothes. The only reason I’m not returning it is because it does help with my tailbone pain. If you have a sensitive nose go with another option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We love these. We've used them at both home and work offices, and this current purchase was a gift for our neighbors. They make a HUGE difference in comfort, even in high quality office chairs. My husband and I both have back issues, and these cushions have made long work days much more tolerable. They are easy to launder and last well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for long car rides
reviews.reviewText: I have back issues and my husband had just had hip replacement surgery. We used these cushions for a long car trip and they helped tremendously to support us and keep us comfortable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed! Lifesaver!
reviews.reviewText: I fell on my tailbone, twice within a day! I don’t think it is fractured, but definitely bruised, you can see it. I was unable to sit comfortably for days…. I have a ACDF of m cervical spine from C3 through T1, so I’m no stranger to spinal pain…. Since the day I unpacked it, I haven’t had to cringe or slowly lower myself making sure I’m in the right position. Definitely recommend it,Even if you don’t have a bruised coccyx bone!! So happy I found this!! Lifesaver!

reviews.reviewTitle: Good product at a reasonable price.
reviews.reviewText: Good product at a reasonable price.
I bruised my tailbone and had no luck with a donut pillow. This pillow allows me to comfortably sit without any pain.
Da quando lo comperato, è lo uso poso dire che per mio lombasiatica un po' meglio, lavoro tante ore in piedi,. Fino adesso mi fa sentire meno dolore poi si vedrà.

reviews.reviewTitle: Ayuda y estoy mejor de lo que pensaba.
reviews.reviewText: Necesitaba algo comodo para aliviar unas molestias y me ha ayudado. No es mágico pero me ayuda y estoy mejor que sin el cojín.
Produit ferme, ne se deforme pas à l'usage. ( Je pèse 105kg!)
